column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This was my second time at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba and it did not disappoint! I highly recommend their happy hour. It is from 4-6pm daily and it includes a wide selection of their tapas at great prices. It also has the sangria pitchers on it which is arguably the best part. I brought my boyfriend who lived in Spain for a few months and although he was skeptical at first
column2: he was very impressed with how authentic the food and sangria tasted. If you come in for happy hour you do have to sit by the bar which is a bit darker and not as cute. The dining room is a lot brighter and the decor is very nice. Overall
